concept.title: Cosmic Tics
concept.description: A celestial re-imagining of the classic Tic-Tac-Toe, where players battle for dominance across the cosmos by strategically placing stars and nebulae on a grid of constellations.
concept.objective: To be the first player (or AI) to achieve three of their celestial symbols in a row, either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally, on a cosmic game board.
mechanics: Grid-based placement: Players take turns selecting an empty space on the 3x3 cosmic grid to place their celestial symbol.
Symbol selection: Players choose between placing a 'Star' (X) or a 'Nebula' (O) on their turn.
Win condition check: After each placement, the game checks if the current player has achieved three of their symbols in a row.
player_abilities: Strategic placement: The primary ability is to choose the most advantageous square to place a symbol, aiming for winning lines and blocking opponents.
Symbol choice: The player can decide whether to place a Star or a Nebula, which can be a strategic choice based on the board state (though in a standard Tic-Tac-Toe, this choice is fixed per player).
AI opponent: For single-player, the player can engage with an AI opponent of varying difficulty levels.

enemies.name: Stardust Sprite (Easy AI)
enemies.behavior: Places symbols randomly in available spaces.

enemies.name: Gravity Guardian (Medium AI)
enemies.behavior: Prioritizes winning moves, then blocks immediate threats, and places randomly otherwise.

enemies.name: Singularity Sentinel (Hard AI)
enemies.behavior: Uses advanced minimax algorithms to predict opponent moves and always plays optimally.

powerups.name: Comet Strike
powerups.effect: Allows the player to remove an opponent's symbol from the board once per game.

powerups.name: Supernova
powerups.effect: Forces a re-roll of the opponent's next move (AI might pick a different random spot or re-evaluate strategy).

concept.level_progression: The game can progress through different 'Galactic Arenas' which are simply cosmetic variations of the 3x3 grid. Each arena could represent a different nebula or star cluster. Difficulty can be increased by facing tougher AI opponents.
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for winning a match (e.g., 100 points). Ties (draws) can award a smaller amount (e.g., 25 points). Bonus points can be awarded for winning quickly or with a specific type of win (e.g., diagonal).
concept.visual_style: A vibrant, topdown 2D aesthetic with deep space backgrounds. The game board is a stylized representation of a constellation. Player symbols are glowing stars (X) and swirling nebulae (O). Animations should be subtle and ethereal, with particles and light effects. UI elements are sleek and sci-fi inspired.
concept.sound_theme: Ambient, atmospheric electronic music with subtle chimes and ethereal synth pads that evoke the vastness of space. Sound effects should be crisp and satisfying, like the gentle hum of a star igniting or the soft swirl of a nebula when placing a symbol. Victory sounds are triumphant and celestial.

level_design.name: First Contact
level_design.description: The universe is vast and full of wonders.  Begin your cosmic journey by mastering the basic celestial formations.  Watch out for stray cosmic debris and curious celestial beings.

objectives.description: Place three Stars (X) in a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.
Do not collide with any celestial beings.

enemies.basic: A small, jagged asteroid with a faint purple glow.
enemies.aggressive: A quick, sharp red comet with a trailing fiery tail.

obstacles.wall: A solid, dark grey rectangular block.

assets.background: Deep black space filled with faint, distant star speckles and soft, flowing purple and blue nebulae clouds.

ui_elements.score: White, clean, futuristic numbers in a rectangular box with a light blue outline.
ui_elements.health_bar: A horizontal bar that fills with a vibrant green color. Starts empty and solid grey.
